fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Protecția datelor personale, Dreptul de autor, Neutralitatea Internetului, Dreptul la liberă circulație, Drepturile fundamentale ale omului
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The mission of Copyratul Roman Asociation is to contribute to sthe knowledge sharing, to the free speech and to be part of  developing of free culture with an accent on Internet as a communication and creation environment. 
 
We reach to the general public using using two approaches in order to fulfill our mission, awareness campaigns/events intended to inform the general public about the issues we identify, and secondly the establishment and growth of online communities. 
 
As a added element we believe that we can provide relevant information to members of decision making bodies, in order to help them make informed decisions.
inter_groups: The European Pirates (PIRATES) or European Pirate Party (PPEU)
